text: Yared Nuguse (/ˈjɑːrɪd nəˈɡuːs/ YAR-id nə-GOOSS; born June 1, 1999) is an American professional middle-distance runner. In 2025, he set the world record for the indoor mile. His time was 3:46.63. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1999 births Category:American middle-distance runners
title: Yared Nuguse
